@kmaomnak
That's actually true, but only partially. I am initial seeding the file, which means I am putting it all out there in hopes that the peers will fill in the gaps of everyone else, and eventually the full upload will be completed and mass seeding can start ;)

And, no, I don't play on private servers, I actually own the game, so I play with my Steam friends, and occasionally have LAN parties at my house. (But only with L4D1, I don't much like the new game, save for The Passing)

If you'd like to play online Google Setti, and click on the second link (This is the setup guide) I have made this very easy to do on my Demonoid upload, but TPB doesn't like outside links in descriptions :/

Hey there people i dowloaded this torrent and extracted it. went to go and play it and and it would load the video and then kick me off saying tht i need steam. 

So i ended up dowloaded Steam and the 2.0.1.6 master update pack and now it says no permisson to run l4d2 =|

Can any help out or tell me a torrent where i dont need Steam to play?

Well... downloaded it, extracted it, read the comments found out you have to get the standalone patch, found out the patch is for 1.0.8, only try updating it to 1.0.6 and...... says that installer integrity has failed and that there's incomplete download or damaged media. WTF!!!!!!

1: unzip to your own folder
2: update with master update2.0.1.6
3: update with incremental update 2.0.1.6-2.0.1.7
4: update with incremental update 2.0.1.7-2.0.1.8
5: update with the standalone patch and then run the game :)

PS: don't update with the Incremental(Mini) Update Version 2.0.1.6-2.0.1.9
if you do that you can't update with the standalone patch and can't play

Hi, where can I find the 2.0.1.5 patch for this game, all I can find is 2.0.1.5 - 2.0.1.6
Its an update from 2.0.1.5 to 2.0.1.6
Please help

Firstly, thanks Arctic!  

Secondly, this is a link to get you patched to the latest version and playing online.  http://blog.theevilpc.com/2009/11/how-to-update-and-play-left-4-dead-2-no.html

This torrent is already updated to 2.0.1.3, however the patch is dated now.  Download and run the .exe file that updates L4D2 from 2.0.1.3 to 2.0.2.2, you can find it on the page.  Lastly, run "L4D2_Rev_Emu_for_v2020.exe" (the file is on the site).  It allows you to play without steam.

Once all that is completed go to the "rev.txt" file in your L4D2 directory, double click and change your name.  The instructions for everything that I just said is in the link I provided.

Hope to see you on the servers!
